{{pp-vandalism|small=yes}} {{short description|American criminal, cult leader}} {{Use mdy dates|date=July 2018}} {{Use American English|date=November 2017}} {{Infobox criminal | name = Charles Manson | image = MansonB33920 8-14-17 (cropped).jpg | caption = Manson in 2017 | birth_name = Charles Milles Maddox | birth_date = {{birth date|1934|11|12}} | birth_place = [[Cincinnati, Ohio]], U.S. | death_date = {{death date and age|2017|11|19|1934|11|12}} | death_place = [[Bakersfield, California]], U.S. | occupation = Singer/songwriter | known_for = [[Manson Family]] murders
[[Tate–LaBianca murders]] | charge = 9 counts of murder
1 count of conspiracy to commit murder | penalty = Death (originally)
Life imprisonment (1972-2017) | spouse = {{unbulleted list|{{marriage|Rosalie Willis|1955|1958|end=div}}|{{marriage|Leona Stevens|1959|1963|end=div}}}} | children = 2 (1 alleged) | partners = Members of the [[Manson Family]], including [[Susan Atkins]], [[Mary Brunner]], and [[Tex Watson]] | height = {{height|ft=5|in=2|out=cm}}{{cite web|url=https://www.npr.org/2017/11/20/565303969/charles-manson-leader-of-murderous-cult-dies-at-83|title=Charles Manson, Leader of Murderous Cult, Dies at 83|publisher=NPR|accessdate=January 19, 2019}} or {{height|ft=5|in=6|out=cm}}{{cite book|url=https://books.google.com/?id=fozN5LkhB8sC&pg=PA223&lpg=PA223&dq=height+indicated+on+the+California+Department+of+Corrections+record+card+reprinted+on+page+118+of+The+Manson+File#v=onepage&q=height+indicated+on+the+California+Department+of+Corrections+record+card+reprinted+on+page+118+of+The+Manson+File&f=false|title=Swinging Single: Representing Sexuality in the 1960s|first1=Hilary|last1=Radner |first2=Moya|last2=Luckett|date=April 12, 1999|publisher=U of Minnesota Press|via=Google Books|isbn=978-0-8166-3351-7}} depending on source | parents = {{plainlist| * Colonel W. H. Scott Sr. (father) * Kathleen Maddox (mother) * William Manson (stepfather) }} | imprisoned = | signature = File:Charles Manson signature2.svg | victims = 9 killed by proxy 1 attempted 2 raped 4 victimless arsons | other_names = No Name Maddox Charles Milles Maddox Charles Hanson Chuck Summers Charles Miles Summers Jesus Christ JC }} '''Charles Milles Manson''' ({{né}} '''Maddox''', November 12, 1934{{snd}}November 19, 2017) was an American criminal and cult leader. In mid-1967, he formed what became known as the "[[Manson Family]]", a quasi-commune based in California. His followers committed [[Manson Family murders|a series of nine murders]] at four locations in July and August 1969. According to the Los Angeles County district attorney, Manson plotted to start a race war, though he and others disputed this motive.{{Cite book|title=Goodbye Helter Skelter|last=Stimson|first=George|publisher=The Peasenhall Press|year=2014|isbn=978-0-9913725-8-4|location=California|pages=5}} In 1971, he was convicted of first-degree murder and [[Conspiracy (criminal)|conspiracy]] to commit murder for the [[Tate murders|deaths of seven people]], including the film actress [[Sharon Tate]]. The prosecution conceded that Manson never literally ordered the murders, but they contended that his ideology constituted an overt act of conspiracy.{{Cite web|url=https://law.justia.com/cases/california/court-of-appeal/3d/61/102.html|title=People v. Manson|website=Justia Law|language=en|access-date=2019-05-11}} Manson was also convicted of first-degree murder for the deaths of Gary Hinman and [[Donald Shea]]. {{Infobox serial killer |name = Malachi Martin |image = |caption = |birthname = Malachi Earl Martin |alias = |birth_date = 1831 |birth_place = [[Willunga, South Australia]], [[Australia]] |death_date = {{Death date and age|1862|12|24|1831|df=y}} |death_place = [[Adelaide Gaol]], [[Adelaide]], [[South Australia]], [[Australia]] |cause = [[Hanging]] |parents = Michael Martin
Mary Martin |conviction = [[Murder]] |sentence = [[Death]] |victims = 2–5 |beginyear = 1856 |endyear = 1862 |country = [[Australia]] |states = [[Adelaide]] |apprehended = June 1862 }} {{Infobox serial killer | name = | image = Ivan Milat.jpg | caption = Milat's 1971 [[mug shot]] | birth_name = Ivan Robert Marko Milat | signature = Ivan_milat_signature.png | alias = "Bill"
